description: '''Athens Tango Project''' is an Argentine [[tango music]] band founded in 2012 in the city of [[Athens, Georgia]] by Laura Camacho, a [[Double bass]] musician from [[Buenos Aires]], featuring Monique Osorio on vocals, John Phillips on drums, John Cooper on violin, and Matt M Vu, David Marcus, on [[piano]]. The extended lineup includes Keiko Ishibashi, Franziska Brunner, Teresa Grynia, Curran Pendergrast, Bill Oglesby, Daniel Allen, James Perkins, Jaime Antonio Cardenas Espana, Serena Scibelli, Fernando Deddos, and Ricardo Hurtado.
